Verses: 1 dhevane, Seeyonil Umakkaagath Thudhiyaanadhu Amaindhu Kaaththirukkiradhu; Poruththanai Umakkuch Seluththappadum.
2 jebaththaik Ketkiravare, Maamsamaana Yaavarum Ummidaththil Varuvaargal.
3 akkirama Vishayangal Enmel Minji Vallamaikondadhu; Dhevareero Engal Meerudhalgalai Nivirththiyaakkugireer.
4 ummudaiya Piraagaarangalil Vaasamaayirukkumpadi Neer Therindhukondu Serththukkollugiravan Baakkiyavaan; Ummudaiya Parisuththa Aalayamaagiya Umadhu Veettin Nanmaiyaal Thirupthiyaavom.

5 boomiyin Kadaiyaandharangalilum Dhooramaana Samuththirangalilumullavargal Ellaarum Nambum Nambikkaiyaayirukkira Engal Ratchippin Dhevane, Neer Bayangaramaana Kaariyangalaich Seygiradhinaal Engalukku Needhiyulla Uththaravu Arulugireer.
6 saandhagunamullavargal Idhaik Kandu Sandhoshappaduvaargal; Dhevanaith Thedugiravargale, Ungal Irudhayam Vaazhum.
7 samuththirangalin Mummuraththaiyum Avaigaludaiya Alaigalin Iraichchalaiyum, Janangalin Amaliyaiyum Amarththugireer.
8 kadaiyaandhara Idangalil Kudiyirukkiravargalum Ummudaiya Adaiyaalangalinimiththam Bayappadugiraargal; Kaalaiyaiyum Maalaiyaiyum Kalikoorappannugireer.

9 dhevareer Boomiyai Visaariththu Adharku Neerppaaichchugireer; Thanneer Niraindha Dhevanadhiyinaal Adhai Migavum Sezhippaakkugireer; Ippadi Neer Adhaith Thiruththi, Avargalukkuth Thaaniyaththai Vilaivikkireer.
10 adhin Varappugal Thaniyaththakkadhaai Adhin Padaichchaalgalukkuth Thanneer Iraiththu, Adhai Mazhaigalaal Karaiyappanni, Adhin Payirai Aaseervadhikkireer.
11 varushaththai Ummudaiya Nanmaiyaal Mudisoottugireer; Umadhu Paadhaigal Neyyaaip Pozhigiradhu.
12 vanaandhara Thaabarangalilum Pozhigiradhu; Medugal Sutrilum Poorippaayirukkiradhu.
13 meychchalulla Veligalil Aadugal Niraindhirukkiradhu; Pallaththaakkugal Dhaaniyaththaal Moodiyirukkiradhu; Avaigal Gembeeriththup Paadugiradhu.
